title: Grateful Dead Live at Capital Centre on 1988-09-05
lineage: MC > standalone TDK DA-5800 CD recorder, via Nak BX-300 cassette deck > EAC to extract to hard drive > CD Wave for splitting resulting .wav files, mkw to encode to shn > flac + AUD2 (shnid = 131131) Complete Show OTS 2 Nakamichi CM100s w/10v batt/cP4 shotguns(XY)>Sony TCD5M (Maxell MX90s); Transfer: Nakamichi CR7A>Lucid AD9624>Fostex D5>DAT> Tascam DA20MKII>Tascam CDRW700>CDR> Wavelab 6>CDWave>Flac Frontend(Level 6); Recording by DATBRAD; Master cassette transfer to DAT by Mark Lynn*; DAT to CDR and conversion to wav>flac by DATBRAD - matrix mixing by Kevin Tobin
source: Matrix 3 Source Mix - SBD1 (shnid = 80630) Set 1 only - SBD -> Cassette Master (TDK SA90) Transfer Info: Cassette Master (Sony TC-WE475) -> Apogee Minime (24bit/48k) -> Samplitude Professional v8.01 -> FLAC/16 All Transfers and Mastering By Charlie Miller + AUD1 (shnid = 83250) Set 2 only NAK-100s > Sony D-5, using Dolby B > Maxell MX- 90s > recorded by Boyd McHugh from tapers' section
